transcript:
Customer: Aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. Kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay paschat prayas karein. The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir, hello. Haanji sir, Shashank Tripathi baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART se. Baat kar rahe the na sir?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Video meeting aapka...
Customer: Ka maine arrange kara tha. Video meeting ho gaya aapka?
Customer: Haan, video meeting toh hua. Woh madam keh rahi thi ki main usko din bhar mein set kar dungi aur phir aapko message kar dungi.
Executive: Haan, kuch kuch cheezein unhone identify kari hui hain, jo yahan se correct honi hain. Toh uske liye maine jo hai na pointers daal diye hain. Baaki main aapko jo hai na, yeh number aapka WhatsApp par hai?
Customer: Haanji, hai na.
Executive: Theek hai, main aapko na WhatsApp ping kar deta hoon. Toh further koi bhi update aapko chahiye rahega, aap mere se directly jo hai na pooch sakte hain.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Theek hai, koi nahi.
Executive: Theek hai, baaki yeh kaam jo bhi pending hai, woh aaj ki date mein main complete kara ke kal morning aapko jo hai na update daal dunga.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai, koi nahi sir. But haan, please, ek cheez yaad rakhiyega sir, please koi bhi buylead aisa consume mat kijiyega jo aapke kaam ka na lag raha ho. Matlab try karne ke liye bhi consume mat kijiyega. Reason being na, woh aapka consumption pattern kharab kar deta hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh buylead...
Customer: Yahi problem hua hai. Actual mein yahi problem ho raha hai mere ko lag raha hai. Kyunki mere ko leads aa hi nahi rahe hain. Main kisi ko kisi click kar raha hoon, woh gadbad ho rahe hain.
Executive: Nahi, usme kya karna hai sir, dekho agar lead nahi bhi dikh rahi hai na aapko, toh koi dikkat nahi hai. Usme panic hone ki koi zarurat nahi hai. Lekin kya hai na ki kharab lead consume karne se problem yeh hoti hai ki aapka purana bhi jo consumption pattern humne bana ke rakha hoga, hai na, woh cheez kharab ho jaati hai.
Executive: Toh dekhiye, main long term sochunga na ki mere ko aaj nahi lead aa rahi hai, iska matlab yeh thodi hai ki main koi aisa product ka buylead consume kar loon just to check ki bhai jo hai na, woh mere liye relevant hoga ya nahi hoga.
Executive: System ko toh yeh lagega na ki aapke liye relevant hai isliye aapne le liya.
Customer: Ji sahi baat hai.
Executive: Theek hai na? Toh isliye woh cheez main aapko guide kar de raha hoon. Baaki cheezein main phir se complete kara ke aapko update daal dunga. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji. Okay okay.
Executive: Aur kuch bhi rahega, aap mere ko WhatsApp connect kar lena ya phir is number pe directly call kar lena.
Customer: Theek hai, yeh WhatsApp number toh aapka aa gaya hai, 8368215097 yahi hai na?
Executive: Haanji haanji haanji haanji. Theek hai. Aap us pe directly message daal dijiyega, baaki kuch bhi agar rehta hai toh.
Executive: Rehti hai ticket aapka open hua tha, toh isko main close kar raha hoon. Kuch bhi rehta hai aap mere ko directly call kar sakte hain.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai sir, thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving leads.

- Customer facing issues with lead consumption.



Resolution:

- Executive advised against consuming irrelevant buyleads.

- Executive assured to complete pending work and update.

- Executive shared WhatsApp number for further assistance.

- Executive offered direct call for any issues.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, lead consumption, whatsapp, update
